text: Stan van Bladeren (born 1 October 1997) is a Dutch professional footballer who plays for Danish 1st Division club Silkeborg IF as a goalkeeper. ==Career== ===Club career=== Van Bladeren joined the Ajax youth academy from local club Foreholte aged 15.Even voorstellen: Stan van Bladeren - Ajax He made his professional debut at Jong Ajax on 6 February 2015 in an Eerste Divisie game against FC Volendam. He played the full game in a 3–4 away win. On 24 August 2020, van Bladeren joined newly relegated Danish 1st Division club Silkeborg IF after two weeks of trial, signing a deal until June 2022.SIF henter målmand i Holland, silkeborgif.com, 24 August 2020 ==References== ==External links== * Profile - Voetbal International Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:People from Teylingen Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Dutch footballers Category:Dutch expatriate footballers Category:Jong Ajax players Category:AFC Ajax players Category:Silkeborg IF players Category:Eerste Divisie players Category:Dutch expatriate sportspeople in Denmark Category:Expatriate footballers in Denmark
title: Stan van Bladeren
